Title: Commissions a study regarding the quality of health care services received by foster children in New York state
Summary: Commissions a study regarding the quality of health care services received by foster children in New York state; provides for a report to be submitted by the commissioner of the office of children and family services detailing the findings of such study.
ActClause: AN ACT to commission a study regarding the quality of health care services received by foster children in New York state
